articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.title: Bitcoin (BTC) tops $45,000 as cryptocurrency rally continues - CNBC
articles.description: Traders are excited about the potential approval of a bitcoin exchange-traded fund in the U.S. as well, as the upcoming bitcoin "halving."
articles.content:
Bitcoin surged late Monday, topping $45,000 to hit its highest level in nearly 21 months, as the rally in cryptocurrencies continues into 2024.
The world's largest cryptocurrency hit an intra-day hi… [+1319 chars]
